text: གྷ་རུང་པ་ལྷའི་རྒྱལ་མཚན་གྱི་གསུང་འབུམ། Works of Gharungpa Lhahi Gyaltsen 噶惹巴·拉沃蔣慈大師全集
zh-TW: 噶惹巴·拉沃蔣慈大師全集
zh-CN: 噶惹巴·拉沃蒋慈大师全集

nodes.en: theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos kyi rnam par bshad pa de nyid snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bstan pa spyi 'grel gyi 'grel bshad rgyas par bzhugs/
chos dbyings gsal sgron zhes kyang bya grub mtha'i shan 'byed zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
nges don gyi chos la bskul ba nam mkha'i nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
nges don la bskul ba nam mkha'i nor bu'i skabs su 'debs rgyu'i lung bsdus zhes bya ba/
zab lam sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i khrid yig thar lam gsal byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
zab lam rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi bar du dge ba'i khrid yig bzhugs so/ /
zab lam rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi tha mar dge ba'i khrid yig bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen dol po pa'i rnam thar rgyas pa las slar yang bsdus pa lha'i rgyal mtshan gyis bkod pa'i dbu phyogs legs so/ /
khro rgyal rdo rje shugs kyi bskang ba'i dbu phyogs bzhugs so/ /
